ygData.subject: Re: Azog an' Oogog
ygData.msgSnippet: The max for Skills is 255 points,your skill cap goes up every level by 5 points before you max out for your current level and you get your original 5 points.
ygData.messageBody:
The max for Skills is 255 points,your skill cap goes up every level by 5
points before you max out for your current level and you get your original 5
points. so at level 50 you can have 50 x 5 = 250 + your original 5 = 255 max
skill level
-----Original Message-----
From: King, Darrin <dking@...>
To: 'shadowknight@onelist.com' <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:37 PM
Subject: [shadowknight] Re: Azog an' Oogog


>From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
>Also, isn't 250 da max for a skill?
>
>*smile* I hear it is 300 or higher. But, that is the whispered words of a
>Teir'Dal, filtered through the web of lies we use to protect ourselves here
>in the undergrounds of Freeport.
>
